sense.def:
Kadar
one's intuition
nekomu pove, da je nekaj tako in nič drugače, ali kadar nekdo
has an intuition about something
, ta človek čuti, da je nekaj tako in nič drugače, čeprav za to nima pričevanj ali dokazov.

seg.quote: My intuition told me to stay away.
I've got an intuition that something is wrong.
